profile.description: I am a person who sees the world of web development as unique and innovative. I love to dedicate time to improve myself in this sector. If you can think it you can program it!

experience.second-job-task:
Display of alerts with Grafana.
Deployment of containers with Docker.

projects.title: Projects
projects.first-project-description: Web application designed to consult and save international recipes.
projects.second-project-description: Game designed to select 10 numbers that are the same. You have as many chances as you need to find them.
projects.third-project-description: Web application designed to save and consult a list of tasks.
